name: Scarecrow
description: The Scarecrow is a medium-sized construct designed to resist fear, appearing indistinguishable from an ordinary scarecrow when motionless. It has a humanoid shape with a straw-filled body that instills terror among those who see it.
memorable: Possesses the ability to instill fear in opponents and is hard to destroy due to its spell-created nature.
goals: To create terror among living creatures and protect its designated area.
relations: Often used by its creator for nefarious purposes; may be served by other constructs.
environment: Typically found in fields, farms, or areas near its place of creation.
strengths: Immunity to poison and various conditions, along with exceptional Dexterity for evasion.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire, which can cause ongoing damage.
attacks: Can make a Multiattack using its Scare ability and two slam attacks for bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Scare ability can frighten creatures within 30 feet, making them panic and flee.
senses: Has darkvision that allows it to see in dim light within 60 feet.
additional_information: False Appearance lets it blend in as a regular scarecrow until it moves.
Flammable trait causes ongoing fire damage after being hit with fire.
Local Spirit limits its movement to one mile from its creation site.
Requires a DC 19 dispel magic check to be destroyed.
Use of Hat of Illusion allows it to mimic a humanoid for deception.
test_queries: scarecrow that instills terror in creatures
construct that acts like a regular scarecrow
durable scarecrow with ongoing fire damage
